question: They haven’t spent the night ‘there’. (Decide which part of speech is underlined)
Monkeys are _____ learners than elephants.
The train runs at a speed of 65 kms ______ hour.
You should decide which one of the three choices. A, B or C best ______ the question.
Everybody has attended the conference, _______?
Joy Thomas ______ the marathon for the first time in 2009.
She wouldn't have yawned the whole day if she _____ late last night.
We often go fishing _______ the river bank.
She has three children ______ her first husband.
Priya said to him, "Why are you working so hard"? (Choose the correct reported speech of the Direct Speech given above)
options: Priya asked him why he was working so hard
Priya asked him why was he working so hard
Priya asked him why he has been working so hard
Priya asked him why he had been working so hard
answer: Priya asked him why he was working so hard

question: A _______ of geese was heard a mile away.

options: To find some reason to quarrel

question: Many medications have other _______ besides the intended one.
